pages.text: $(li)The Lavawaxed enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/straddleboard)$(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/straddleboard)Straddleboard$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment gives to you the $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/fire_resistance)Fire Resistance$(/l) effect, which makes you immune to any kind of fire damage while using the $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/straddleboard)Straddleboard$(/l).
pages.title: Lavawaxed
